content: reversible textured dishcloth by sammie carraher looks exactly the same on both sides can be made in small or large size or any size you want body uses only one row repeated materials 55 to 60 yards of worsted weight cotton yarn knitting needles size us 7 or 8 4 5 to 5 0mm or whatever size needle you want to use with your yarn depending on how loose you want the finished fabric of the dishcloth gauge not important use smaller needles with your yarn if you want a tight weave or bigger needles if you want a looser weave stitches knit purl and knit one behind knit in the back loop of the stitch cast on 32 sts for a smaller sized dishcloth 36 sts for a larger sized dishcloth any multiple of 4 sts can be used if you want to use the same pattern to make a placemat or coaster or afghan row 1 slip 1 purl wise knit to end of row repeat this row 3 more times 4 row total row 2 slip 1 purl wise knit 2 knit 1 behind purl 1 repeat till last three stitches knit 3 repeat this row until the cloth is just about square now repeat row 1 four more times and bind off weave in ends slipping the first stitch purl wise on each row will give a very nice finish to the edges of the cloth
